description: Try our easy to follow Chocolate Custard Bread Crust Tarts recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chocolate Custard Bread Crust Tarts Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 20 minutes or until the crusts are just browned and the custard has only a slight wobble. Cool completely in the tray before removing carefully. Dust with icing sugar to serve.
